This patch works thx now i can play online again but i cant change my name with the name command

To change your name: 
1. Go to the CSS folder, find "rev.ini" file
2. Open it with text editor and find string that contains following:

  PlayerName=

3. Replace whatever comes after "=" (which will probably be "unnamed") with desired nickname.
4. Save the file and check out the game.
